about_the_game:
Hidden from the outside world, there is a little magical town protected by a crimson moon. Begin your new life when you discover the mysterious village of Crimson Hollow.



Make something magical! Players in Crimson Hollow can explore the art of crafting and create unique items from the resources they gather. With skills in mining, blacksmithing, fishing, herbalism, and alchemy, players can unlock their true magical potential.


As players journey through Crimson Hollow, they will collect a wide variety of items, reagents, and resources. Additionally, players will have the freedom to personalize their home and showcase their magical creations.


Quests are an essential part of gameplay in Crimson Hollow. Players can complete quests for villagers in order to earn income, crafting recipes, and special items. Beyond tangible rewards, completing quests helps to reveal the rich backstories of villagers and uncover hidden secrets within this magical town.


The magical townsfolk of Crimson Hollow are the heart of gameplay. Players will be able to get to know the unique characters in town and build relationships with them. By completing quests for them and spending time with them, players can uncover new secrets and reveal hidden perks.


Pick a backstory for your character and roleplay your way! In Crimson Hollow, players can customize their character to have custom outfits, hair, and skin color combinations at the start of the game. As they progress through the game, they can later change their appearance to better suit their evolving style.

short_description: Crimson Hollow is a cozy crafting RPG set in a mysterious little town. Master your craft as you collect mystical ingredients, concoct enchanted potions, and forge friendships that may lead to something truly magical.
